title: [Large-scale] Precision Teaching Strategies for Online Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational secondary mathematics concepts and experience with online learning tools
context.additional_context: Modular content organization and mobile-optimized environment provision considering time constraints of adult learners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the three core principles of precision teaching (goal setting, systematic feedback, data-driven improvement) for online mathematics education

Learners can design at least two microlearning modules that effectively deliver procedural knowledge (problem-solving steps) and declarative knowledge (understanding mathematical concepts) in mobile environments
Learners can present integrated operational plans for formative and summative assessments for online learning quality management and apply them to actual instructional design
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
